about_the_game:
"The Shield of the Kingdom" is a strategic tower defense game which offers rich tactical gameplay and intense combat experiences.

Welcome to a land of fantasy filled with magic and swordsmanship. Your kingdom is suffering under relentless invasions by mysterious monsters, as a commander appointed in times of crisis, you will travel to various besieged towns, fighting side by side with the locals to defend against the fierce enemy onslaughts.

The game features different levels of complexity. During the "Town Development" phase, players need to focus on fortifying defenses, recruiting troops, scouting for enemy movements, and selecting missions; In the "Tactical Deployment" phase, they assign heroes and soldiers for expeditions, considering their skill sets, types, and even positioning. When the horn sounds, it marks the moment to give everything in battle to protect the kingdom from destruction. As missions progress, the scale of battles will expand, becoming more perilous and brutal. Players can unlock stronger equipment and advanced troop types, gradually enhancing their strength to counter the growing threat. Any commander who believes victory is assured risks paying a heavy price for such hubris.

This pre-update is a test version:

It includes 1 battlefield, 6 unique allied heroes each with distinct skills, 3 types of basic allied units, 12 types of basic enemy units, 2 types of intermediate enemy units, and 1 enemy boss.

Each hero possesses exclusive skills and background stories, and careful combinations can add infinite possibilities to battles, encouraging players to explore and find the most effective strategies against all kinds of enemies.

Now come and join " The Shield of the Kingdom" to become the hero of your country, leading your team in this epic battle and writing your own glorious chapter in this grand conflict.
